name: crud-clubs
description: crud app splitted in front end and back ends servers, NextJs serves frontend with react UX while NestJs serves RESTfull endpoints for reading and modifying user data

scripts.installApp: npm install && cd frontEnd && npm install && cd ../backEnd && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontEnd && npm run dev" "cd backEnd && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:windows: start cmd /k "cd frontEnd && npm run dev" & start cmd /k "cd backEnd && npm run dev"
scripts.jest:windows: start cmd /k "cd backEnd && npm run jest"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd backEnd && npm run build" "cd frontEnd && npm run build"

author: Timothy Burton
